title: Unable to login "Unexpected error occured while logging in"
body:
So two days ago i tried loggin on my account ,error shows up "An unexpected error occurred while logging in".
Since then i can't login onto account,i've tried changing regions,making accounts just to see if it is the server problem,but it isn't,
I am unable to join on any possible server.
I tried reinstalling the game,hextech repair tool,chaning dns servers,reinstalling windows and so on,still i cant fix this.
Can you please help me ,this is getting so frustrating. 
https://prnt.sc/ff4fv6

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having problems specifically getting to the authentication server.  The steps you've taken so far are more focused on bad game files, but I recommend focusing more on network.  In this case, I suggest going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide instead to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
this is obviously not a problem on our end. man many people are having tis problem. please fix i havent been able to play in a week noww
I got this problem when my anti virus updated and my firewall started blocking LOL.
Worked for me: Just right click League of legends launcher and then click Troubleshoot Compatibility, select Try Recommended settings, Test the program, Then next and save the new settings
